name: gemini-research-mcp
description: AI-powered research using Gemini: quick grounded search + Deep Research Agent
long_description:
MCP server providing AI-powered research capabilities using Google Gemini:

- **research_web**: Fast web research with Gemini grounding (5-30 seconds)
- **research_deep**: Comprehensive autonomous research agent (3-20 minutes)
- **research_followup**: Continue conversation with previous deep research sessions
- **resume_research**: Recover interrupted or in-progress research sessions
- **list_research_sessions_tool**: List previous research sessions
- **export_research_session**: Export completed research to Markdown, JSON, or Word (DOCX)

tools.name: research_web
tools.description: Fast web research with Gemini grounding (5-30 seconds). Use for fact-checking, current events, documentation.
